resources.string: Ugomba gukoresha porogaramu rimwe kugirango ubashe kugera kuri kamera inyuma

Kuri Android 11+, mbere yo gutangira gufata amajwi inyuma, porogaramu igomba kuba ikora kandi igaragara byibura rimwe kugirango ubashe gukoresha kamera inyuma. Kubwibyo, nyuma yo gutangira igikoresho, kora progaramu igaragara hanyuma nyuma yo kudafunga serivise yo gufata amajwi, igomba kuguma mubimenyesha.
Gufata amashusho byahagaritswe kuko kamera ikoreshwa nubundi buryo
Gufata amashusho byarahagaze kuko kamera yibikoresho yahagaritse gukora
Kamera yakoreshwaga nubundi buryo. Nyamuneka ntukoreshe izindi porogaramu zishobora kuba zikoresha kamera mugihe ufata amashusho. Android yemerera porogaramu imwe gusa gukoresha kamera icyarimwe

Kunanirwa gufungura kamera yatoranijwe. Bibaho rero ko kamera zose zihishe zishobora gukoreshwa na progaramu iyo ari yo yose. Inganda nyinshi zemerera gusa gukoresha mugukoresha kavukire. Kamera isanzwe izafungura.
Kamera yigihe gito (yari) itaboneka gufungura kubikoresho byawe (ikosa rya sisitemu ya kamera)
Iki gikoresho ntabwo gifite kamera yubatswe kandi ntabwo gishyigikira kamera zo hanze. Gufunga…
nta kwamamaza kumafaranga ayo ari yo yose
Kuraho amatangazo, impano igomba kuba cyangwa myinshi.
Ku mpano nto, kwamamaza bivanwaho gusa kuri ecran nkuru
Amakuru yo guhaha ntarashyirwaho. Waba uri kumurongo kandi winjiye kuri konte yawe ya Google?
Kuraho amatangazo iteka hamwe nimpano imwe yigihe cyose. Urashobora kandi gutanga buri kwezi kugirango ukureho amatangazo
Kwamamaza bivanwaho rwose mugihe abiyandikishije kumafaranga ayo ari yo yose buri kwezi arakora.
Porogaramu ntabwo itanga igihe cyikigereranyo cyo kwiyandikisha, kubera ko ibikorwa byose bya porogaramu bimaze kuba ubuntu, abiyandikisha bakuraho gusa kwamamaza
Kwamamaza bivanwaho rwose mugihe abiyandikishije bakora.
Porogaramu ntabwo ikuwe muburyo bwiza bwa bateri. Niba kamera idakora inyuma cyangwa ikindi kintu, noneho ongeraho iyi progaramu usibye uburyo bwo kuzigama ingufu.
Niba wongeye kwinjizamo porogaramu kuri Android 11, noneho dosiye zishaje zigomba gusibwa intoki
Wahagaritse serivise yinyuma kugirango uhite utangira gufata amashusho. Fungura porogaramu kugirango uyongere kuyitangiza.
Gukoresha Bateri -> Porogaramu zose -> Shakisha porogaramu -> Ntugahuze /kubika
Iyi ni beta verisiyo ya porogaramu, ibintu bimwe rero ntibishobora gukora cyangwa bidahinduka.
Shyiramo verisiyo ihamye kuva mububiko bwo gukiniraho kugirango wirinde amakosa.
Kamera yahagaritse gukora muburyo butunguranye, itangira…
Funga ibyifuzo byawe mbere yo gutangira gufata amajwi
Kunanirwa gufungura mikoro, gufata amajwi bizakomeza nta majwi
Ntushobora gufungura igenamiterere riva muri iyi porogaramu, nyamuneka gerageza uyishakire ukoresheje igikoresho gisanzwe cya sisitemu igenamigambi isanzwe
G-sensor yabonye ihungabana, videwo izabuzwa kwandikwa
Hagarika ibikoresho bya batiri kuriyi porogaramu mugikoresho cyawe kugirango wirinde amakosa ya kamera
Ikosa ryabaye mugihe wagera kuri kamera. Gukoresha Bateri birashoboka
Nyamuneka shyiramo urubuga kugirango ufungure umurongo
Nta rezo yo kubona aderesi, cyangwa kugerageza gutangira igikoresho
Kunanirwa gusiba dosiye. Urashobora kuba wongeye kugarura porogaramu kandi uruhushya rwa dosiye rwatakaye, nyamuneka gerageza kuyikuramo intoki
Kuramo umwanya kugirango ukomeze gufata amashusho
Mugaragaza nyamukuru ya porogaramu ntishobora gutangizwa kubera ko SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW (kwerekana hejuru yizindi Windows zose zisaba) uruhushya ntirwatanzwe cyangwa ecran yikintu yazimye
Porogaramu isobanutse ntishobora gutangurwa kugirango ifungure mu buryo bwikora kubera ko \"kwerekana hejuru ya porogaramu zose\" uruhushya rutatanzwe.
Porogaramu ntishobora gufungurwa kuko ecran yazimye (ifunze).
Porogaramu ntishobora gufungurwa kugirango itangire gufata amajwi kuko ecran yazimye (ifunze). Koresha serivise yo gufata amajwi (AutoStart) kugirango ukosore ibi.
Porogaramu ntishobora gufungurwa kugirango itangire gufata amajwi kubera ko \"kwerekana hejuru ya porogaramu zose\" uruhushya rutatanzwe. Kanda kugirango utange
Funga izindi porogaramu ukoresheje kamera hanyuma utangire iyi porogaramu

Siba amashusho ashaje, fata ikarita yawe ya SD, cyangwa ugerageze indi. Kandi, gabanya umwanya ntarengwa wo gufata amashusho (bike ni byiza). Umubare munini wa videwo wabitswe urashobora gutera ibibazo nkibi. Reba kandi Ibibazo bijyanye namakarita ya SD muri Igenamiterere /Ibibazo. Urashobora kandi kugerageza kwandika kuri memoire ya terefone aho kuba ikarita yo hanze
Hagarika gufata amajwi. Ntabwo kwibuka bihagije kugirango ukomeze
Nyamuneka tegereza isegonda mbere yo guhagarika gufata amajwi nyuma yo gutangira
Guhindura kamera, ugomba guhagarika gufata amajwi
Ingano ya videwo yose kuva mubunini bwemewe
Nta mashanyarazi ahagije afite kuri igikoresho. Shira amafaranga cyangwa utangire gufata amajwi niba amafaranga ari hejuru ya 1%%
Ipaki yindimi ya TTS (Android Text-to-Speech) ntabwo yashyizweho. Fungura kuri enterineti kugirango utangire gukuramo
Serivisi yo gufata amajwi yananiwe gutangira. Kanda kugirango uhagarike optimizasiyo ya porogaramu
Ijwi rirasabwa gufata amajwi mugihe ufata amashusho
Kamera irakenewe kugirango ifate amashusho no kureba kamera.
Iyi porogaramu isaba uruhushya rwo gukoresha kamera gufata amashusho. Ariko warabyanze. Gufunga… Gerageza gutanga uruhushya kuri kamera mumiterere ya sisitemu yiyi porogaramu
Ikibanza kirakenewe gushushanya imirongo, aderesi n\'umuvuduko kuri videwo yafashwe, cyangwa kwerekana aya makuru kuri ecran nkuru (ukurikije igenamiterere ryawe).
Imenyekanisha rirasabwa kugirango ubashe kwerekana serivise yo gufata amajwi inyuma hamwe no gufata amajwi muburyo bwo kumenyesha.
Ububiko burakenewe kugirango ubike videwo mububiko busangiwe no muburyo bwo gufata amajwi
Ugomba gutanga ibikoresho byegeranye (Bluetooth) uruhushya rwo gufata ibyabaye byikora. Ibi birashobora gukorwa muri sisitemu ya sisitemu.
Nyamuneka gerageza guhitamo inzira itandukanye (ibikoresho byabitswe)
Yahagaritswe kubera ko igikoresho kidashyigikira geocoding
Andika amajwi avuye mu gikoresho cya Bluetooth
Koresha gusa na terefone ya Bluetooth. Niba uhuza umutwe wumutwe (radio yimodoka) ukoresheje Bluetooth, noneho kubwimpamvu runaka irashobora guhita iterefona kuri numero isanzwe kuriki gikoresho

Niba bishoboka, izindi porogaramu ntizishobora gukoresha mikoro. Niba byahagaritswe, iyi porogaramu ntishobora gushobora gufata amajwi mugihe porogaramu nyinshi zirimo gukora mikoro (Android ntabwo buri gihe yemerera gukoresha mikoro icyarimwe)
Amajwi yafashwe muri CAMCORDER ntashobora gukora kubikoresho bimwe, muriki gihe gerageza uhindure MIC
Tangira gufata amashusho mu buryo bwikora iyo porogaramu itangiye
Hitamo igikoresho cya Bluetooth cyangwa ikindi

Mu buryo bwikora butangira gufata amajwi mugihe igikoresho cya bluetooth gihujwe. Kugirango serivise ikurikirana ya bluetooth itangire nyuma igikoresho gitangiye, birakenewe ko igikoresho (ecran) gifungura niba hari ijambo ryibanga
Tangira mugihe uhuza igikoresho cya bluetooth

Gutangira gufata amajwi mu buryo bwikora iyo sisitemu itangiye, igikoresho (ecran) kigomba gufungurwa niba hari ijambo ryibanga. Nyuma yo gupakira, birashobora gufata iminota mike mbere yuko sisitemu imenyesha porogaramu ko itangiye.

Mu buryo bwikora butangira gufata amajwi mugihe cyo kwishyuza. Kugirango serivisi ishinzwe kwishyuza itangire nyuma yuko igikoresho gitangiye, igikoresho (ecran) kigomba gukingurwa niba hari ijambo ryibanga
Hagarika mugihe ucomeka igikoresho cya bluetooth
Mu buryo bwikora butangira gufata amajwi iyo ucometse mumajwi (AUX)
Hagarika iyo uciwe na jack amajwi (AUX)
Gukoresha bateri birashobora kubuza porogaramu gukora neza (urugero, gukoresha kamera cyangwa kuvugurura aho uri gufata amashusho inyuma). Kanda hano kugirango uhagarike iyi porogaramu ubu
Gukoresha Bateri birashobora kubuza porogaramu gukora neza (urugero, ukoresheje kamera na mikoro). Kanda hano kugirango uhagarike iyi porogaramu ubu
Ikimenyetso mugitangiriro cyo gufata amajwi ya dosiye ikurikira
Uruganda rukora ibikoresho ntirushobora gutanga kamera zose, kuburyo bamwe badashobora gufungura
Uruganda rukora ibikoresho ntirushobora gutanga kamera yagutse ya porogaramu zose
Mu buryo bwikora fungura itara mugihe ufata amajwi
Uruganda rukora ibikoresho ntirushobora gutanga 60 FPS kubisabwa byose
Irengagize amakuru ya GPS hamwe nikosa hejuru
Erekana umuburo mugihe GPS na Google geolocation byahagaritswe
Erekana umuburo gusa iyo GPS ihagaritswe

Hano hari igenamiterere kubikoresho byawe kugirango wemerere porogaramu gukora autoplay no gukora inyuma. Kanda hano hanyuma wongere porogaramu kubidasanzwe (emerera autostart nibindi) kugirango wemererwe gukora inyuma kandi mugihe ecran yazimye, niba bibujijwe
Fungura porogaramu iyo gufata amajwi bitangiye
Tangiza porogaramu iyo gufata amashusho bitangiye
Hamwe na Android 11 no hejuru yayo, ntushobora guhitamo porogaramu iyo ari yo yose yashyizweho kuko sisitemu ubwayo igabanya porogaramu igaragara (politiki y’ibanga)
Kuvugurura ahantu ukoresheje GPS gusa (ntukoreshe umuyoboro)
Niba umuvuduko agaciro ari mubi, gerageza uburyo bwa kera. Niba indangagaciro ari zeru cyangwa zidakunze kuvugururwa, gerageza uburyo bushya
Kuringaniza hagati yukuri neza (guhuza), umuvuduko no gukoresha ingufu za batiri.
Ahantu nyaburanga (guhuza) n\'umuvuduko kubera gukoresha ingufu za bateri nyinshi.
Ubusobanuro buke bwaho (guhuza) n\'umuvuduko kubera gukoresha ingufu za bateri nke.
Mu buryo bwikora gusiba amashusho ya kera mugihe ufata amajwi niba nta mwanya uhagije wa videwo nshya
Komeza ecran gusa mugihe ufata amajwi
Zingurura gukoresha ibirometero aho gukoresha kilometero
Inzira yo gufata amajwi ntabwo yashyizweho, kanda hano kugirango uyishireho
Ahantu amashusho (kubika ububiko), igihe cya videwo, gufata amajwi, G-sensor, GPS
Ahantu hafashwe amashusho (ububiko bwo kubika), igihe cya videwo, gufata amajwi, ingano nini ya videwo
Igihe cya videwo - ni kangahe kubika
Hagarika videwo kuva auto-gusiba (overrite) mugihe hit hagaragaye
Tangira gufata amajwi mugihe hagaragaye icyerekezo
Kubikorwa bya Bluetooth birashoboka gusa niba \"inyandiko gusa iyo kwishyuza\" ihagaritswe.

Ntugatangire serivise ya AutoStart kugirango ubike bateri mugihe utegereje ibyabaye kuri autostart yafashwe. Kuri Android 8+ ibi birashoboka niba gusa ibyabaye kuri Bluetooth byashobotse naho ibindi bigahagarikwa.

* Urashobora kuzimya ubu buryo kugirango porogaramu ikore amajwi yikora gusa mugihe serivisi yinyuma ya porogaramu (AutoStart) ikora.
- Kwandika byikora kubintu nko kwishyuza, Bluetooth cyangwa AUX birashobora gukorwa nta kibazo kigera kuri Android 7.1.
- Guhera kuri Android 8+, gufata amajwi byikora bidafite serivisi isaba inyuma (AutoStart) birashobora gukorwa gusa kubikorwa bya Bluetooth, kandi mubindi bihe (mugihe wishyuza cyangwa AUX) ugomba kubanza gutangira serivise yinyuma yibikorwa (AutoStart) - mugutangiza i Porogaramu ubwayo rimwe.
- Uhereye kuri Android 11+, udafite serivise yinyuma ya porogaramu (AutoStart), kugera kuri kamera nta mikoreshereze yabakoresha kugirango utangire gufata amajwi birashoboka gusa niba uruhushya rutanzwe "hejuru ya porogaramu zose".
Kwandika byikora nubwo serivisi yinyuma idakora (AutoStart)
Tangira gufata amajwi iyo umuvuduko uringaniye /hejuru (ukurikije GPS)
Hagarika gufata amajwi mugihe nta kugenda
Hagarika gufata amajwi mugihe umuvuduko uri hasi (ukurikije GPS)
Kwandika gusa mugihe igikoresho kirimo kwishyuza
Ubushobozi ntarengwa bwo kwibuka bwa videwo zose (gufata amajwi)
Mugihe utangiye porogaramu, fungura /uzimya, fungura sisitemu
Mugaragaza byihuse /birebire, kanda, aderesi no kwerekana umuvuduko, idirishya rya popup, buto nibindi

Amagambo ahinnye yo gutangira gufata amajwi, byihuse kandi birebire kanda kuri ecran, pop-up idirishya, kunyeganyega mugihe byafashwe amajwi, kumenyesha amajwi, kunyeganyega, buto kuri ecran, kuzimya ecran nibindi byinshi
Mu buryo bwikora uhindura kamera kumunsi /nijoro muburyo bwihariye
Bitrate yo hejuru - ubuziranenge bwiza, ariko ubunini bwa dosiye nini
Ibindi byinshi FPS - videwo yoroshye, ariko byihuta ya bateri. Nibyiza gushiraho agaciro kambere kurwego rwo hasi (iyakabiri irashobora kuba hejuru) kugirango yandike neza mwijimye
Gutangira /guhagarika gufata amajwi udatangije ecran nkuru
Yerekana idirishya hamwe na buto yo kugenzura hejuru ya progaramu zose
Erekana idirishya rireremba gusa iyo gufata amajwi bikora (hanyuma ufunge byikora iyo bihagaze)
Ntabwo ashyigikiwe na kamera iriho. Ababikora akenshi babuza imikoreshereze yabyo - iraboneka gusa muri porogaramu isanzwe ya Kamera
Erekana ubutumwa mugihe utangiye cyangwa uhagarika gufata amajwi mugihe cyo gufata amajwi
Ijwi mugitangira, guhagarika cyangwa gufata amakosa
GPX - igishushanyo cya XML cyateguwe nkimiterere rusange ya GPS ya porogaramu ya porogaramu. Irashobora gukoreshwa mugusobanura inzira, inzira, n\'inzira
Kora dosiye ya GPX kuri buri videwo
Kurenga amashusho yerekana amashusho: Itariki (igihe), aderesi yaho, guhuza n\'umuvuduko
Kurengaho ibisobanuro kuri videwo: itariki (kashe yigihe), inyandiko yihariye
Kenshi namakuru agezweho, byihuse bateri izashira
Menyesha ikosa, impanuka cyangwa utange igitekerezo
Emerera iyi porogaramu kugaragara hejuru yizindi porogaramu zose. Ibi birakenewe guhita utangira /guhagarika gufata amashusho cyangwa kwerekana idirishya rireremba
Emerera iyi porogaramu kugaragara hejuru yizindi porogaramu zose. Ibi birakenewe kwerekana idirishya rireremba
Garuka murugo murugo (gufata amajwi) kugirango ukoreshe igenamiterere hanyuma utangire serivisi yo gukurikirana
Fasha kunoza cyangwa gutunganya ibisobanuro byanditse mururimi rwawe
Hindura igishushanyo nizina rya porogaramu muri sisitemu
Nyuma yo guhinduka, porogaramu irashobora gufunga, igishushanyo gishaje kizakurwaho kuri ecran nkuru ya terefone (cyangwa kurutonde rwibisabwa byose), hanyuma hagaragara ikindi gishya.
Erekana kamera yerekana kamera kuri ecran nkuru
Kunyeganyega mugihe utangiye cyangwa uhagarika gufata amajwi
H.265 codecs ya HEVC na AV1 itanga ubuziranenge bwiza kuri bitrate yo hasi kurenza H.264 AVC, urashobora rero kubika umwanya mugabanya bitrate. Ariko videwo irashobora kudakina mubakina amashusho
Hagarika niba ushaka kugenzura intoki sensor ikadiri yigihe, igihe cyo kwerekana, sensitivite, na aperture
Indorerwamo ya horizontal. Ishusho irahinduka gusa gufata amashusho, kureba ntabwo bihinduka
Gukemura, igipimo cya biti, icyerekezo, kwibanda, kamera, uburyo bwijoro
Ibi birakenewe kugirango ubone GPS nyayo yihuta, kimwe na aderesi hamwe. Kanda kugirango utange
Birasabwa kugirango ubashe kwerekana serivise yo gufata amajwi hamwe na statut kumwanya wo kumenyesha. Kanda kugirango utange
Kwandika byikora hejuru ya Bluetooth bisaba uruhushya. Kanda hano kugirango utange
Kugirango ugere kuri ultra yagutse ya kamera (lens), urashobora gushiraho ibintu byo zoom
Kuri ubu, gufata amajwi ntibishoboka kuko mikoro ihagarikwa nindi porogaramu

Amabanga: Amashusho yose wanditse azabikwa gusa kubikoresho byaho. Porogaramu ntishobora kubika amashusho yawe (ntaho ihuriye na seriveri)\n\nPorogaramu izakomeza gukora inyuma (serivise yimbere igaragara mukumenyesha) mugihe gufata amajwi birakora, mugihe ugarutse murugo, uhindukire kurindi porogaramu cyangwa ufunge terefone yawe kugirango ukomeze gufata amajwi, kandi iyo ufunguye ibiranga gufata amajwi byikora (niba ufunze serivise yinyuma, iyi mikorere ntabwo izakora). Porogaramu ikoresha Firebase Analytics kubisesengura ryibanze ritazwi (reba umurongo hepfo)
Gufata amashusho mashya byatangiye nta majwi yafashwe
Shiraho ingengabihe yo gutangira gufata amajwi
Kureka gufata amashusho yikora ukurikije igihe kiriho?
Serivise yigihe cyo guhita itangira gufata amashusho
Uzi neza ko ushaka gusiba iyi dosiye?
Uzi neza ko ushaka gusiba dosiye?
Uzi neza ko ushaka gusiba ubu bubiko bwa videwo?
Uzi neza ko ushaka gusiba amakuru yububiko bwa videwo?
Hagarika iyi videwo gusiba mu buryo bwikora (overrite)?
Idosiye ya videwo yimuriwe mububiko burinzwe
Nyamuneka fungura igenamiterere rya porogaramu hanyuma wemerere kwinjira mububiko bwa terefone
